positions.subtitle: Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: â€¢ Coordinated with a team of 48 people to successfully organize and execute Kshitij 2020 with overall participation of 10000 studentsâ€¢ Garnered total amount worth INR 3.2 lakhs through corporate and alumni funding from the region of Bangalore, Chennai and Kolkataâ€¢ Lead a team of 42 Campus Affiliates and 14 Campus Ambassadors from various colleges and led the publicity campaign across different regions of country specially selected for the publicity of Kshitij, also organized Kascade in 3 regions through themâ€¢ Responsible for sponsorship and publicity of Kshitij 2020 in Kolkata along with online publicity in the region of Maharashtra and Biharâ€¢ Boosted participation by more than 200% in prelims of events conducted at prominent places of Bihar, Jharkhand and Raipurâ€¢ Boosted participation by 150% from Uttar Pradesh through digital publicity campaign conducted by the symposiumâ€¢ Managed participation of 980 students from different colleges of Kolkata in Robotics Workshop conducted by the symposiumâ€¢ Managed procurement worth INR 20 Lakhs, designed certificates in a two-membered Procurement and Publication teamâ€¢ Judiciously planned and digitally designed the notices of various events to facilitate understanding of procedure for participationâ€¢ Mentored a team of 42 Campus Affiliates and 170 Volunteers for in-campus management activities of the symposium
positions.title: Core Organising Team Member
positions.description_html:
â€¢ Coordinated with a team of 48 people to successfully organize and execute Kshitij 2020 with overall participation of 10000 students
â€¢ Garnered total amount worth INR 3.2 lakhs through corporate and alumni funding from the region of Bangalore, Chennai and Kolkata
â€¢ Lead a team of 42 Campus Affiliates and 14 Campus Ambassadors from various colleges and led the publicity campaign across different regions of country specially selected for the publicity of Kshitij, also organized Kascade in 3 regions through them
â€¢ Responsible for sponsorship and publicity of Kshitij 2020 in Kolkata along with online publicity in the region of Maharashtra and Bihar
â€¢ Boosted participation by more than 200% in prelims of events conducted at prominent places of Bihar, Jharkhand and Raipur
â€¢ Boosted participation by 150% from Uttar Pradesh through digital publicity campaign conducted by the symposium
â€¢ Managed participation of 980 students from different colleges of Kolkata in Robotics Workshop conducted by the symposium
â€¢ Managed procurement worth INR 20 Lakhs, designed certificates in a two-membered Procurement and Publication team
â€¢ Judiciously planned and digitally designed the notices of various events to facilitate understanding of procedure for participation
â€¢ Mentored a team of 42 Campus Affiliates and 170 Volunteers for in-campus management activities of the symposium
